content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I appreciate your interest in my apartment. Let's start negotiating the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I know that you want 550 euros for the apartment. I am a student and I am looking for a place with the lowest price possible. I am smart, dependable and responsible, so I think I can take good care of your apartment. How about 450 euros?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you offered is too low for me. I am looking for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 480 euros? I will take good care of your apartment, and I am a dependable and responsible person. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with you, the landlord.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you offered is still not high enough for me. I am looking for the highest possible price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
